name: UpsidownToEarth
description:
The CATZ invaders are planning to brainwash terrans using their secret weapon called “RrRr” ! You must stop them ! But first... You need to fix the super-secret (and a little bit forgoten) space ship ! 

Use your mouse or gamepad to orient the ship and guide the BallBot.

Project created for Unreal Megajam 2019.

Imported Assets :

  • Toon Mountain River (by me, on sale on Unreal Engine Marketplace) :
    • T_LUT1
    • T_LUT4
    • MF_ToonShadingFilter
  • Freesound.org :
    • SW_396082__romariogrande__space-pea-lava-dance by Romariogrand

1 man job

I hope you'll have fun, even if I couldn't make as much levels as I wanted in a week.
I have a lot of ideas to add mechanics to this game after jam *smoke getting out of my ears* but for now, I'll probably sleep :-)
